bibl.title: The Popularity of the Sarapis Cult as Depicted in Letters with Proskynema Formulae.
bibl.note: Egyptian Society of Papyrology Inv. 254. Letter from Alcibiades to his mother. Unknown provenance, second century A.D. - Inv. 253. Letter from Sarapion to his father. Unknown provenance, undated.
Aly Zaki, The Popularity of the Sarapis Cult as Depicted in Letters with Proskynema Formulae.
